This application installs a new version: Esta aplicación instala una nueva versión de ProcessMaker.
You must have your database credentials: Debe tener sus credenciales de la base de datos disponibles para continuar.

Installing ProcessMaker database, OAuth: Installing ProcessMaker database, OAuth SSL keys and configuration file.
ProcessMaker installation is complete. P: ProcessMaker installation is complete. Please visit the URL in your browser to continue.
Installer completed. Consult ProcessMake: Installer completed. Consult ProcessMaker documentation on how to configure email, jobs and notifications.
ProcessMaker requires a MySQL database c: ProcessMaker requires a MySQL database created with appropriate credentials.
Database connection failed. Check your d: Database connection failed. Check your database configuration and try again.
Failed to connect to MySQL database. Ens: Failed to connect to MySQL database. Ensure the database exists. Check your credentials and try again.
These credentials do not match our recor: These credentials do not match our records.

Passwords must be at least six character: Passwords must be at least six characters and match the confirmation.
